title: Problems with beta client
body:
i have problems with my client, when it opens up i get white screen with this message:
Failed to load URL "https://riot:896a67d5d5024bbf@127.0.0.1:50277/index.html" with error "empty response" (-324).

Hope this helps with fixing errors with client.

replies.body:
I'm not familiar with this one.  Do you ever make it to the login screen?  Are you able to still login through the legacy client:

-  On the login screen of the open beta updated client, look for the "Launch Legacy Client" text at the bottom.
-  Or create a shortcut directly to the legacy client in your League Installation. Just look for "lol.launcher"

This will help rule out possibilities, as I'm unsure if this might be an issue with the client, network, or something else entirely.  Let me know!

Unfortunately I couldn't get to the login screen, and if I launch lol.launcher it doesn't show anything when I press the launch button, but when I star client again new or old it doesn't matter, it shows me the same withe screen with that message.

Thanks for the follow-up.  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our tech team can take a look.  Be sure to add any information you can in your ticket, including the error message.  I also suggest downloading the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to attach some logs to the ticket.  We'll reply back asap!
i am having the same issues. I tried to reinstall but it didn't work at all.
